participant_1.background:
My favorite thing to do on the weekends is to wear my band t-shirts and relax by watching foreign films.
i work at a bar.
My family is small, and we don't have a lot of money
My favorite websites are pet health sites, especially ones with information on poodles.
my mom teaches kindergarten and my dad is a tax assessor.

participant_2.background:
I sometimes struggle to find clothes that fit my body type.
i had one step dad , and fortunately he ignored me.
I've been single for a while now, but I'm looking forward to finding someone to share my life with.
I am resilient and intelligent, thanks to my mom and my love for reading.
i volunteer in my son s boy scout troop.

content.text: What's up?
Not much, you?
Just working at the bar. I love it when it's slow.
Why is that?
I can relax and watch foreign films. I love movies.
Really? Me too! I love foreign films.
What's your favorite foreign film?
I really like "La Vie en rose". It's a french film about Edith Piaf.
Oh, I've heard of that. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a great movie. What's your favorite band?
I like a lot of bands. I'm really into punk rock.
Me too! I love Blink 182.
They're great! I saw them in concert a few years ago. It was awesome.
I'm jealous! I've always wanted to see them live.
They put on a great show. You should definitely see them if you get the chance.
I definitely will.
Cool. We should go to a concert together sometime.
That sounds like a great idea.
I'll let you know when I find a good show.
Sounds good
